ref.title: Effect of the number, position and length of alkyl chains on the physical properties of polysubstituted pyridinium ionic liquids
ref.full: Verdia, P.; Hernaiz, M.; Gonzalez, E. J.; Macedo, E. A.; Salgado, J.; Tojo, E. (2014) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 69, 19-26.

components.name: 1-hexyl-3,5-dimethyl-2-pentylpyridinium bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide
sample: 99 mass %;0.103 water mass %(dried by vacuum heating;solvent extraction)
